meanings.definition: The act of pressing a key on a keyboard.
meanings.sent1: She made multiple keypresses to type the message quickly.
meanings.sent2: I heard the keypresses as she typed on the keyboard.
meanings.sent3: His keypresses were so loud, it sounded like a drum solo!
meanings.sent4: The keypresses echoed through the quiet room like a melody.
meanings.sent5: The keypresses were like musical notes composing a symphony of words.

meanings.definition: The result or effect of pressing a key on a keyboard.
meanings.sent1: The screen displayed her keypresses as she typed.
meanings.sent2: He noticed the keypresses had caused an error in the document.
meanings.sent3: The keypresses seemed to have a mind of their own, creating chaos on the screen.
meanings.sent4: Her keypresses left a trail of words like breadcrumbs in a forest of information.
meanings.sent5: The keypresses left a lasting imprint on the digital canvas of the document.
